sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_table_builder.FlowQueries</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>FlowQueries</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var FlowQueries = Class.create();

// Get triggers of given type
FlowQueries.getTriggersOfType = function(triggerTypes) {
	var triggers = new GlideRecord('sys_hub_trigger_instance');
	triggers.addQuery('trigger_type', 'IN', triggerTypes);
	triggers.addQuery('flow.sys_class_name', 'sys_hub_flow');
	triggers.query();
	return triggers;
},

// Gets all flows
FlowQueries.getFlowDataOfTable = function(sysIds, query) {
	var flows = new GlideRecord('sys_hub_flow');
	if (query)
		flows.addEncodedQuery(query);
	flows.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', sysIds);
	flows.query();
	return flows;
};

FlowQueries.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    type: 'FlowQueries'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-03-29 08:07:08</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>afc5311d77ee811031e3b3c64b5a99f4</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FlowQueries</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Table Builder" source="sn_table_builder">f53f19bac362fa22ca2e93692d32f18f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Table Builder">f53f19bac362fa22ca2e93692d32f18f</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_afc5311d77ee811031e3b3c64b5a99f4</sys_update_name>

    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
